author: bnicholes
msg: Fix the re-linking issue that was causing a segfault when purging elements from the LDAP cache.

author: jorton
msg: Prevent death by memory consumption in an --enable-pool-debug/-lefence
build: allocate and {ab,re}use a single brigade structure rather than
allocating one out of r->pool for each block sent (see also "why are
brigades allocated out of pools this is insane" threads).

author: jorton
msg: Content-Length header is an empty string; previously this was only
an error with some strto* implementations.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: * c-modules/nntp_like/mod_nntp_like.c: Only set the timeout if we're enabled.
